attributes.action: Have cctv cameras instaled in all minor towns and villages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anti social behavior is a major problem in our cities, it is also a major problem in our minor town centres, village centres and council estates.
These are the places where Joe Public is most vunerable! were police dont go often enough and were there is poor street lighting and no cctv coverage.
We ask the government and the primeminister to rectify this and have cctv installed to bring crime and anti social behavior down in these areas.
